AllSeeing.name: Prophecy
AllSeeing.description:
On Equip: Reveal 9 random items.
After Equipping 3 items, Lose.

Amulet.name: Amulet
Amulet.description:
On Equip: Win.
If you would Lose and this is Hidden, Reveals itself and Breaks instead.

Ant.name: Ant
Ant.description: Every 2 Equips, Break the item right of this, Swap with it, and Reveal 1 random item.

Anvil.name: Anvil
Anvil.description:
On Equip: Reveal the items below this.
When you Equip one, Morph the other into an Anvil and Break this.

Armageddon.name: Nuke
Armageddon.description: After Equipping 3 items, Break this and all but the outer rim of items.

Auto.name: Bot
Auto.description: After you Equip an item, Equips a random item near this.

Axe.name: Axe
Axe.description:
Use: Choose an item to Break. Morph the items to its left and right into it.
Can be Used once.

Bank.name: Bank
Bank.description: After you Equip an item, 33% chance for this to gain 1 Gold.

Bankrupt.name: Bankrupt item
Bankrupt.description: On Equip: Lose all your Gold.

Barrier.name: Barrier
Barrier.description:
Nearby items can't be Broken.
Use: Choose an item to Swap this with.
Can be Used once.

Basket.name: Basket
Basket.description: Use: Morph 7 random Hidden items into Fruit and Break this.

Fruit.name: Fruit
Fruit.description: On Equip: If 7 or more Fruit are Equipped, Win.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.description: If you would Lose, Win and erase this Gift instead.

Bed.name: Bed
Bed.description: After Equipping 3 items, Reveal 3 random items.

BigBomb.name: Big Bomb
BigBomb.description: After Equipping 3 items, explodes, Breaking all items within 2 spaces.

BigBrain.name: Brain
BigBrain.description: After you Equip an item, Reveal 1 random item near this.

Bird.name: Bird
Bird.description:
After you Equip an item, 25% chance to Reveal 1 random item near this.
Use: Choose an item to Swap this with.
Can be Used once.

BlackHole.name: Black Hole
BlackHole.description: After you Equip an item, Break all items within 1 space of this, then increase the range Broken by 1.

Blackjack.name: Blackjack Hand
Blackjack.description: On Equip: If 21 other items are Equipped, Win. If more than 21 other items are Equipped, Lose.

Blind.name: Shades
Blind.description: On Equip: Win. If this is Revealed, it can't be Equipped.

Bomb.name: Bomb
Bomb.description: After you Equip an item, Break this and nearby items.

Book.name: Book
Book.description: On Equip: If at least 15 other items are Equipped, Win!

Booster.name: Booster Pack
Booster.description: Use: Unequip this and Morph it into a random a Rare or rarer item.

Boots.name: Boots
Boots.description:
Whenever a Hidden item Breaks, Reveal it.
Use: Choose a Broken item to Fix.
Can be Used once.

BoxJellyfish.name: Jellyfish
BoxJellyfish.description: On Equip: If 2 or more nearby items are Equipped, Lose.

Boxton.name: Squeeton
Boxton.description:
Reveals itself.
On Equip: Reveal 3 random nearby items.

Bracelet.name: Bracelet
Bracelet.description: When each Equipped item is near exactly 2 other Equipped items, Win.

Brilliant.name: To-do List
Brilliant.description: After Equipping 3 Rare or rarer items, Win.

Bubblegum.name: Bubblegum
Bubblegum.description:
On Equip or Round Start: Reveal 1 random nearby item.
Mimics cause you to Win instead of Lose.

Bullseye.name: Bullseye
Bullseye.description: On Equip: If no nearby items are Equipped, Reveal nearby items.

Caterpillar.name: Caterpillar
Caterpillar.description: If this Morphs while Equipped, Win.

Button.name: Button
Button.description: Use: 95% chance to Morph a random nearby item and Reveal it. Otherwise, Lose.

Cage.name: Bottle
Cage.description:
Use: Unequip this and Morph this into Nothing.
After you Equip an item, put a random item in this Bottle.

Cage2.name: Cage
Cage2.description: You can only Equip items within 2 spaces of this.

Cake.name: Cake
Cake.description: When each item in the bottom row is Equipped, Win.

Cannon.name: Cannon
Cannon.description:
Aims towards items you Equip.
Use: Break the item this is aiming at.

Capsule.name: Printer
Capsule.description:
Use: Choose a Revealed item. Morph 5 random other items into it.
Can be Used once.

Careful.name: Warning
Careful.description: On Equip: If 3 items that can make you Lose are Revealed, Win.

Cascade.name: Dandelion
Cascade.description: When all items near this are Equipped, Break this and Reveal all items near them.

Cataclysmic.name: Meteor
Cataclysmic.description: After 15 Hidden items are Revealed, Equipped, or Broken, Lose.

Catalog.name: Catalogue
Catalog.description: On Equip: Reveal the items to the left and right. After you Equip an item, if they're not Equipped, Morph them.

Cell.name: Cell
Cell.description: The next time you Equip an item, Morph the items left and right of it into it.

Challenge.name: Demon
Challenge.description:
Immutable.
You can't Win until this is defeated.
Win 3 times to defeat.

Charon.name: Charon
Charon.description: Every 3 Equips, Swaps with the item to its right. If it can't, Lose.

Checkbox.name: Candle
Checkbox.description: After you Equip a Hidden item, Reveal 1 random item.

Cherry.name: Cherry
Cherry.description: After you Equip an item, Morph the item to its right into it.

Cloak.name: Cloak
Cloak.description: On Equip: If a Wand and Hat are Equipped, Win.

Wand.name: Wand
Wand.description: On Equip: If a Cloak and Hat are Equipped, Win.

Hat.name: Hat
Hat.description: On Equip: If a Cloak and Wand are Equipped, Win.

CrystalBall.name: Crystal Ball
CrystalBall.description: After you Equip an item, Reveal Cloaks, Wands, and Hats near it.

Clock.name: Clock
Clock.description:
Immutable.
When you Equip an item, starts ticking.

ClockUp.name: Second Hand
ClockUp.description: On Equip: Delay Clock by 3 ticks.

Clone.name: Capsule
Clone.description:
Use: Reveal a random nearby item.
Unequip this and Morph this into it.

CloseSpender.name: Vending Machine
CloseSpender.description:
Use: Choose a non-Gold item.
Spend 2 Gold to Unequip it.

Clumsy.name: Mouse
Clumsy.description: After you Equip an item, Equip the item to the left.

Coffee.name: Coffee
Coffee.description: The next 2 times you Equip an item, immediately Unequip it.

Compass.name: Compass
Compass.description: Points roughly towards the nearest Flag.

Completionist.name: Mountain
Completionist.description: When 4 full rows of items are Equipped, Win.

Conveyor.name: Conveyor
Conveyor.description: Use: Shift this row to the left.

Copycat.name: Copycat
Copycat.description:
Use: Choose an item.
Unequip this and Morph this into it.

Costly.name: Price Tag
Costly.description:
Holds 3 Gold.
Equipping Revealed items costs 1 Gold.

Couch.name: Couch
Couch.description:
Immutable.
Use: Choose an Equipped item.
Unequip it, then Equip it.
Can be Used once.

CreditCard.name: Credit Card
CreditCard.description:
Immutable.
Holds 12 Gold.
You must spend 1 Gold to Equip items. If this runs out of Gold, Lose.

Crossbow.name: Crossbow
Crossbow.description:
Use: Choose a nearby item. Break all items in that direction.
Can be Used once.

Crumbling.name: Crumbling Castle
Crumbling.description: After you Equip an item, Break the top item (left to right).

CryoChamber.name: Chamber
CryoChamber.description:
Immutable.
Use: Choose an item to Freeze.
Start the next round with a copy of it.

Cuffs.name: Handcuffs
Cuffs.description: After you Equip an item, Lock 1 random Unequipped item.

Cursed.name: Curse
Cursed.description: If you would Win, this Breaks instead.

CursedBlade.name: Doomed Blade
CursedBlade.description: On Equip: Morph all Hidden items into Skulls.

Dancepad.name: Dancepad
Dancepad.description: Points a direction each time you Equip an item. After Equipping 6 items this points at consecutively, Win.

Daredevil.name: Skateboard
Daredevil.description:
Use: 40% chance to Win.
Otherwise, Lose.

Darts.name: Dartboard
Darts.description: When the total counters on Equipped non-Dartboard items adds to 14 or more, Win.

Delivery.name: Package
Delivery.description: Use: Choose a Revealed item. Break it and this. Next round, Morph the top item into it.

Demolition.name: Wrecking Ball
Demolition.description:
Use: Choose an item to Break.
Can be Used once.

DemolitionTri.name: Wrecking Triangle
DemolitionTri.description:
Use: Choose 3 Equipped items in a triangle shape to Break.
Can be Used once.

Desert.name: Sand
Desert.description: On Equip: If at least 9 items are Broken, Win!

Dice.name: Die
Dice.description:
Use: Unequip and Morph nearby Equipped items.
Can be Used once.

Disappointed.name: Disappointment
Disappointed.description: When a Revealed item that can make you Win is Broken, Win.

DNA.name: DNA
DNA.description: On Equip: Morph all nearby items into the same random item.

Dragon.name: Dragon
Dragon.description: Use: Morph 10 random other items into Skulls. Then, after Equipping 5 more items, Win.

Princess.name: Princess
Princess.description:
Holds 3 Gold.
On Equip: If a Dragon is Revealed, Lose.

DraughtsPiece.name: King
DraughtsPiece.description:
Jumps over items you Equip nearby.
Reveals items it Swaps with.

Dungeon.name: Dungeon
Dungeon.description: On Equip: Morph a random item in each row into a Spike.

Spike.name: Spike
Spike.description: On Equip: If 3 or more Spikes are Equipped, Lose.

Eclipse.name: Time Machine
Eclipse.description: After 3 Equips, this Breaks to Unequip all non-Gift items.

Egg.name: Egg
Egg.description: If this item is Broken while Equipped, Win.

Ephemeral.name: Ephemeral item
Ephemeral.description: After you Equip an item, Unreveal and Morph all Unequipped Revealed items.

Espionage.name: Folder
Espionage.description: On Equip: If at least 20 other items are Revealed, Win!

ExtraLife.name: Mushroom
ExtraLife.description: If you would Lose, this Breaks instead.

Fairy.name: Fairy
Fairy.description: On Equip: If 4 Fairies are Equipped, Win. Otherwise, Morph 1 random Unequipped item into a Fairy.

Filmer.name: Cine-camera
Filmer.description:
Use: Unequip the item right of this, then Swap with it.
Can be Used 3 times.

Fire.name: Flame
Fire.description: On Equip: Morph a random nearby item into a Flame and Reveal it.

Match.name: Match
Match.description: On Equip: Morph 2 random other items into Flames.

Firework.name: Firework
Firework.description: On Equip: Morph 3 random items into Smart Bombs.

FirstAid.name: Tape
FirstAid.description:
Use: Choose a Broken item to Fix.
Can be Used once.

Flagseeker.name: Flagseeker
Flagseeker.description: After you Equip an item, Reveal nearby Flags.

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.description: The next time you Equip a nearby item, Reveal all items in that direction.

Flipflop.name: Snow Globe
Flipflop.description: Whenever a Hidden item Breaks, Fix and Reveal it.

Forest.name: Tree
Forest.description:
Use: Unequip 1 random other item.
Can be Used 3 times.

Forest2.name: Forest
Forest2.description: After you Equip a Hidden item, immediately Unequip it.

Forgetful.name: Forgetfulness
Forgetful.description: On Equip: Morph 2 random Revealed Unequipped items.

Fossil.name: Fossil
Fossil.description:
After you Equip an item, 5% chance to Lose.
On Reveal: Equips itself.

Fox.name: Fox
Fox.description: Use: 15% chance to Win. Otherwise, this Breaks.

Fraidy.name: Fog
Fraidy.description: For the next 5 Equips, you must Equip Revealed items first.

Framed.name: Frame
Framed.description:
Use: Choose an item.
Future Frames will contain it.
Morph it into Magnifier and Break this.

Fridge.name: Fridge
Fridge.description: On Equip: Reveal all nearby items. For the next 3 Equips, you can't Equip them.

Friendly.name: Cuddle Cat
Friendly.description: You must Equip items near this first.

FutureWin.name: Holo-Flag
FutureWin.description: On Win: Win the next round, too.

Gamer.name: Controller
Gamer.description:
Use 1: Break items directly above this.
Use 2: Unequip the item left of this.
Use 3: Morph the item right of this.
Use 4: Unequip, Hide, and Morph this.

Gavel.name: Gavel
Gavel.description: On Equip: If all Revealed items are Equipped, Win.

Gear.name: Gear
Gear.description:
Use: Choose an Equipped item.
Unequip, Unreveal, and Morph it.
Can be Used once.

Ghost.name: Ghost
Ghost.description: On Equip: Morph 2 random items into Skulls.

Jolly.name: Jolly Hat
Jolly.description: On Equip: Unequip all Presents. When you Equip a Present, Unequip it and Break this.

Glip.name: glip
Glip.description: after you equip an item, this swaps with a random item near this and reveals it.

Glitched.name: Glitch
Glitched.description: Whenever items Morph, they Morph into Glitches. On Equip: If 2 Glitches are Equipped, Lose.

Gloves.name: Gloves
Gloves.description:
Use: Choose an Unequipped Revealed item. Morph it.
Can be Used 2 times.

Goggles.name: Goggles
Goggles.description:
On Equip or Round Start: Reveal 4 random items.
Prevent the next 3 times you would Reveal an item.

GrapplingHook.name: Grappling Hook
GrapplingHook.description: After you Equip the leftmost item in a row, Reveal the rightmost item in that row.

Gravity.name: Gravity
Gravity.description: You can only Equip items in the bottom row or directly above another Equipped item.

Hacker.name: Moon
Hacker.description: After you Equip an item, 20% chance to immediately Unequip it.

Halo.name: Screwdriver
Halo.description: On Equip: Fix 5 random Broken items.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: Whenever an item Breaks, 50% chance to immediately Fix it.

Hand.name: Hand
Hand.description: Whenever Equipped items Morph, Unequip them.

Heart.name: Helmet
Heart.description: For the next 5 Equips, you can't Lose.

Heartbreak.name: Balloon
Heartbreak.description: After you Equip an item, 2% chance to Lose. Otherwise, increase this chance by 2%.

HorizontalSight.name: Window
HorizontalSight.description: On Equip: Reveal all items in this row.

Hourglass.name: Hourglass
Hourglass.description: If you would Lose while this isn't counting down, prevent the Loss and Lose in 3 Equips.

Hungry.name: Mouth
Hungry.description: On Equip: Morph all items in a random row into Nothing.

Ice.name: Snowflake
Ice.description: You can't Equip items near this.

Impatient.name: Impatient item
Impatient.description: Whenever you Reveal an item in this row, Equip it.

Impossi.name: Stained Glass
Impossi.description: After you Equip an item, 5% chance to Win.

Inescapable.name: The Inescapable
Inescapable.description:
On Equip: Lose.
On Reveal: Morph 2 random Hidden items into The Inescapable.

Info.name: Newspaper
Info.description: On Equip: Reveal 2 random nearby items.

Inky.name: Ink
Inky.description: The next time an item would be Revealed, this Breaks instead.

InstaOpener.name: Crab
InstaOpener.description: On Equip: Equip the items to the left and right of this.

Ivy.name: Ivy
Ivy.description: On Equip: Morph a random item directly above this into Ivy.

JackInThe.name: Sticky Hand
JackInThe.description: Every 2 Equips, Unequip 1 random other item.

JellyGBox.name: Jelly G.
JellyGBox.description: Use: 70% chance to Reveal 1 random item. Otherwise, Breaks.

JumpRope.name: Jump Rope
JumpRope.description: On Equip: Reveal 1 random item, then Morph 2 random items into Jump Ropes.

Jumpscare.name: Bear
Jumpscare.description: On Equip: If no other items are Equipped, Lose.

Key.name: Key
Key.description: If the next item you Equip is a Lock, Win.

Lock.name: Lock
Lock.description: Can be opened by a Key!

Ladder.name: Ladder
Ladder.description: When there is exactly 1 Equipped item in each row, Win.

LandMine.name: Mine
LandMine.description:
On Equip: Break nearby items.
If Broken, Reveals itself.

Locust.name: Termite
Locust.description: After you Equip an item, Break the leftmost item in each row.

Logical.name: Clue
Logical.description: Whenever an item is Broken, Reveal it.

Lonely.name: Lonely item
Lonely.description: On Equip: If this is near a Broken item, Lose.

Loser.name: L
Loser.description: When an entire row of items is Equipped, Lose.

Lucky.name: Clover
Lucky.description: Double all percentage chances on items.

Lunar.name: Tree
Lunar.description: Use: Break this to Unequip 5 random items.

Treasure.name: Treasure
Treasure.description: On Equip: If there is an unbroken path of Equipped items to a Map, Win.

Mask.name: Mask
Mask.description: Every 3 Equips, Break 1 random Equipped item.

Microphone.name: Microphone
Microphone.description: When 10 other items are Equipped, Break this and Reveal 3 random items.

Microscope.name: Sword
Microscope.description: When you try to Equip a Hidden item, 15% chance to Reveal it instead.

Mimic.name: Mimic
Mimic.description:
Appears to be another item from the pyramid until Equipped.
On Equip: Lose.

Mine.name: Pickaxe
Mine.description: After Equipping a nearby item, this gains 1 Gold.

Mirror.name: Mirror
Mirror.description: When this is Equipped, Morphed, Unequipped, or Broken, do the same to all nearby items.

Monopoly.name: Top Hat
Monopoly.description: Holds 2 Gold. Use: 50% chance to double this item's Gold. Otherwise, Breaks.

Monster.name: Devourer
Monster.description: After you Equip an item, Breaks a random nearby item and Swaps with it.

MusicNote.name: Music Note
MusicNote.description: After you Equip an item, if all Revealed items are Equipped, Reveal 1 random item.

Negative.name: Negative item
Negative.description: If you would Win, 25% chance to prevent that Win.

Nessie.name: Nessie
Nessie.description: On Equip: If another Nessie is Equipped, Lose. Otherwise, Morph 1 random Unequipped item into a Nessie.

Notepad.name: Notepad
Notepad.description: On Equip or Round Start: Reveal all nearby items. When you next Equip one, Break the others.

N2.name: Two
N2.description: After you Equip a number, Reveal its double.

N3.name: Three
N3.description: On Equip: Reveal 3 random odd numbers.

N6.name: Six
N6.description: If this is Broken by Five while Equipped, Win. If Broken by anything else, Lose.

N7.name: Seven
N7.description: Whenever you Equip a multiple of 7, 7% chance to Win.

N8.name: Eight
N8.description: Use: Choose a number less than 8. Unequip it and Square it.

N9.name: Nine
N9.description:
On Equip: If exactly 9 other items are Equipped, Reveal 5 random items.
(9 items currently Equipped.)

N10.name: Ten
N10.description: On Equip: Reveal a random multiple of 4.

N11.name: Eleven
N11.description: If you Equip a multiple of 11, Win.

N12.name: Twelve
N12.description: The next time you Equip a number, Break this. If it was less than this, Reveal that many random items.

N13.name: Thirteen
N13.description: After you Equip a number, % chance to Lose equal to it.

N14.name: Fourteen
N14.description:
Use: Choose an Equipped number.
If it's a multiple of 4, Unequip it. Otherwise, Break it and this.

N15.name: Fifteen
N15.description:
When 5 or more Equipped numbers are 10 or less, Win.
(15 currently Equipped.)

N16.name: Sixteen
N16.description: Whenever you Equip a multiple of 6, Break it.

N18.name: Eighteen
N18.description: Odd numbers cannot be Equipped. If you try to Equip one, Reveal it instead.

N19.name: Nineteen
N19.description: If you would Equip a perfect cube, Break it and Reveal items near it instead.

N20.name: Twenty
N20.description: On Equip: Breaks random other Revealed numbers until at least 100 is added to the Break Total.

N21.name: Twenty One
N21.description: Use: Break and Reveal 2 random numbers. If the difference between them was 8 or less, Reveal all numbers inbetween.

N22.name: Twenty Two
N22.description: If at any point, Equip Total exceeds 500, Lose.

N23.name: Twenty Three
N23.description: Use: Break a random Equipped number. If at any point Equip Total is exactly 230, Win.

N24.name: Twenty Four
N24.description: If you Equip a perfect square, Lose.

N25.name: Twenty Five
N25.description: On Equip: If Five is Equipped, Reveal 5 random items.

N26.name: Twenty Six
N26.description: Use: Choose 2 numbers less than 26. Reveal their sum and Break this.

N27.name: Twenty Seven
N27.description: On Equip: Break and Reveal nearby prime numbers.

N29.name: Twenty Nine
N29.description:
When the Equipped numbers in this row sum to 150 or more, Win.
(Current total: 29)

N30.name: Thirty
N30.description: On Equip: Reveal random numbers until at least 100 is added to Reveal Total.

N31.name: Thirty One
N31.description: On Equip: Unequip all multiples of 10. If none were Equipped, Equip Ten instead.

N32.name: Thirty Two
N32.description: On Equip: Fix random Broken numbers until Break Total is 32 or less.

N33.name: Thirty Three
N33.description: Whenever you Equip a prime number, Reveal 1 random non-prime near it.

N35.name: Thirty Five
N35.description: Use: Unequip this and Morph it into a random number between 1 and 10.

N36.name: Thirty Six
N36.description: When a run of 4 numbers is Equipped (e.g. 3, 4, 5, 6), Win.

N37.name: Thirty Seven
N37.description: On Equip: If Five is Equipped, Win. Otherwise, Lose.

N38.name: Thirty Eight
N38.description: On Equip: Reveal all nearby numbers. If their total adds up to 150 or more, Lose.

N40.name: Forty
N40.description: When a Revealed multiple of 3 is near this, Break it.

N41.name: Forty One
N41.description: Whenever you Equip a multiple of 5, Reveal 1 random number.

N42.name: Forty Two
N42.description: Use: Choose a number. Break it and this, then Reveal a random number higher and a random number lower than it.

N43.name: Forty Three
N43.description: Use: Reveal a random item. If it was an odd number, Break this.

N44.name: Forty Four
N44.description: If you would Win and Equip Total is above 300, Break 5 random Equipped numbers instead.

N45.name: Forty Five
N45.description: The next time you Equip a number, Break this. If it was greater than this, Win.

N46.name: Forty Six
N46.description: Use: Choose a number. Unequip this and Morph this into it plus 1.

N47.name: Forty Seven
N47.description: Use: Choose a number. Unequip this and Morph this into it minus 1.

N48.name: Forty Eight
N48.description: Whenever you Equip a number, Break and Reveal a random number less than it.

N49.name: Forty Nine
N49.description: Whenever you Equip a number, Reveal its successor.

N50.name: Fifty
N50.description: When Equip Total is a multiple of 50, Win.

OrbBlast.name: Basket
OrbBlast.description: On Equip: Morph 1 random item in each direction from this into a Fruit.

Orb.name: Fruit
Orb.description: On Equip: If all Fruit are Equipped, Win.

Pandoras.name: Skeleton
Pandoras.description: On Equip: Morph all other Revealed items into Skulls.

Patterned.name: Scissors
Patterned.description: On Equip: For each nearby item, Morph 1 random item into it.

PayForReveals.name: Telescope
PayForReveals.description: Use: Spend 1 Gold to Reveal 1 random item.

Petal.name: Petal
Petal.description: The next 2 times a Hidden item Morphs, Reveal it.

PiggyBank.name: Piggy Bank
PiggyBank.description: After you Equip an item that can spend Gold, this gains 2 Gold.

PlayingCard.name: Ace
PlayingCard.description: On Equip: Reveal 2 items near each other. You must Equip one of them next.

Antidote.name: Antidote
Antidote.description: On Equip: Break all Revealed Poisons and Viruses.

Police.name: Bubble
Police.description: On Equip: If at least 10 other items are Equipped, Lose.

Polterbox.name: Poltergeist
Polterbox.description:
Use: Choose an item. Swap it with a random item near this.
Can be Used 3 times.

Portal.name: Portal
Portal.description:
Use: Choose 2 items to Swap.
Can be Used once.

Potion.name: Potion
Potion.description:
Immutable.
Use: Give +1 Use to all non-Potion Equipped limited Use items.
Can be Used once.

PriceyRowRevealer.name: Wishing Well
PriceyRowRevealer.description: Use: Spend 3 Gold to Reveal all items in a random row.

Programmed.name: Terminal
Programmed.description:
Immutable.
You can only Equip items in the highest row with no Equipped items.

Puppet.name: Puppet
Puppet.description:
On Equip or Round Start: Reveal 4 random nearby items.
After Equipping 10 items, Lose.

Puzzle.name: Vexbox
Puzzle.description:
When there are 30 Broken items, Win.
Use: Break 6 random items.

PuzzlePiece.name: Puzzle Piece
PuzzlePiece.description:
On Equip or Round Start: Morph 2 random Unequipped items into Puzzle Pieces.
When this is near another Equipped Puzzle Piece, Win.

Queen.name: Queen
Queen.description:
After you Equip an item in any direction, Swaps with it.
After doing this 3 times, Lose.

Radar.name: Radar
Radar.description: Every 3 Equips, Reveal the nearest Hidden item.

Reset.name: Bin
Reset.description: On Equip: Unequip, Hide, and Morph Equipped items within 2 spaces.

Revolver.name: Revolver
Revolver.description:
Use: Choose an item.
Spend 1 Gold to Break it.

Ritual.name: Scroll
Ritual.description:
After you Equip an item, gains a charge.
Use: Break this to Reveal random items equal to its charges.

Rocket.name: Rocket
Rocket.description: On Equip: Break 3 random Unequipped Revealed items.

Rogue.name: Hero
Rogue.description:
Immutable.
You can only Equip items near this.
After you Equip an item, this Swaps with it.

RowBomb.name: Uranium
RowBomb.description: If you Equip another item in the same row as this, Break all items in this row.

RowGold.name: Rowgold
RowGold.description: Holds 1 Gold for each other Equipped item in this row.

RowSweeper.name: Row-Sweeper
RowSweeper.description: Displays the number of items in this row that can make you Lose.

Rowwin.name: Pancake
Rowwin.description: On Equip: If all items in this row are Equipped, Win.

RowWinseeker.name: Row-Winseeker
RowWinseeker.description: Displays the number of items in this row that can make you Win.

Sacrificial.name: Staff
Sacrificial.description:
Use: Break 1 random item, then Reveal 1 random item.
Can be Used 4 times.

Safeguard.name: Camera
Safeguard.description: The next 2 times you try to Equip a Hidden item, Reveal it instead.

Satellite.name: Satellite
Satellite.description: Whenever you Reveal an item, 10% chance to Reveal 1 additional random item.

School.name: Ocean
School.description: On Equip: Morph 3 random Hidden items into Fish.

Fish.name: Fish
Fish.description: On Equip: If 3 or more Fish are Equipped, Win.

Scrap.name: Screw
Scrap.description: Whenever another item is Broken, Reveal 1 random item.

Script.name: Script
Script.description: On Equip or Round Start: Morph 1 random Hidden item into a Flag.

Searchlight.name: Spotlight
Searchlight.description: The next time you Equip an item, Reveal items near it.

SeeingStone.name: Seeing Stone
SeeingStone.description:
Use: Reveal 1 random item.
25 Uses left.
Only regains Uses after you Lose.

SelfDestruct.name: Self-Destructor
SelfDestruct.description: After opening another item, this explodes, Breaking itself.

Sentinel.name: Eye
Sentinel.description:
Looks towards items you Equip.
You can't Equip items this sees.

Seven.name: Pin
Seven.description: On Equip: If exactly 10 other items are Equipped, Win.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: If you would Lose, 50% chance for this to Break instead.

Shy.name: Armadillo
Shy.description: After you Equip an item, 33% chance to Unequip this item.

Sleepy.name: Sleepyhead
Sleepy.description: On Equip: Reveal and Break all Flags and Skulls.

Slime.name: Slime
Slime.description: After you Equip an item, Break this and Morph 2 random nearby items into Slimes and Reveal them.

Slots.name: Slot Machine
Slots.description: Use: Spend 1 Gold for a 15% chance to Win.

SmartBomb.name: Smart Bomb
SmartBomb.description:
On Equip: Reveal all nearby items.
After Equipping 2 items, Break this and nearby items.

Snail.name: Snail
Snail.description:
When you try to Equip a Hidden item, Reveal it instead.
Every 2 times this happens, Equip the top leftmost Revealed item.

Sniper.name: Acid
Sniper.description: Whenever another item would be Unequipped, Break it instead.

Soap.name: Soap
Soap.description:
Use: Choose an item to Morph into Nothing.
Can be Used 3 times.

Speedrun.name: Speedrun item
Speedrun.description: On Equip: If no other items are Equipped, Win.

Spellbook.name: Spellbook
Spellbook.description: Use: Reveal 5 random items, then Morph all Hidden items into Skulls.

Sponge.name: Spongebox
Sponge.description:
On Reveal: Reveal 2 random nearby items.
(Equipping an item counts as Revealing it.)

Spreadsheet.name: Spreadsheet
Spreadsheet.description: On Equip or Round Start: Reveal a random item that can Win.

Spring.name: Spring
Spring.description:
Use: Swap the Hero with a random item.
Can be Used 3 times.

Spy.name: Mirage
Spy.description:
On Equip: Reveal all nearby items.
If this is Revealed, it can't be Equipped.

Star.name: Star
Star.description: On Equip: If all nearby items are Equipped, Win!

Study.name: Pencil
Study.description: After you Equip an item, 33% chance to Reveal a random item.

Sus.name: Imboxtor
Sus.description: On Equip: Morph a random Hidden item into a Mimic of another, then Reveal them.

Sweeper.name: Sweeper
Sweeper.description: Displays the number of nearby items that can make you Lose.

Sweeper2.name: Sweeper
Sweeper2.description:
Counts nearby Hidden Skulls.
Use: Choose an item to Reveal.
If it wasn't a Skull, Lose.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description:
When you try to Equip a Monster, Reveal it instead.
If you would Lose to a Monster, Win instead.

Tape.name: Bag
Tape.description:
Use: Choose an item to Unequip.
Can be Used once.

Television.name: Television
Television.description: Use: Break 2 random Revealed items to Reveal 1 random item.

Temporal.name: Time Machine
Temporal.description:
Use: rewind time to when this first became Equip, then Break this.
You keep what items were Revealed.

Territory.name: Glue
Territory.description: You can only Equip items near Equipped items.

Tetris.name: Block
Tetris.description: After Equipping the last Unequipped item in a row, Reveal 2 random items in the row below it.

Three.name: Ticket
Three.description: On Equip: If you've Equipped a Ticket 3 or more times this game, Win.

Tinfoil.name: Tinfoil
Tinfoil.description: You can always Equip all items.

Toolbox.name: Multi-tool
Toolbox.description: On Equip: Morph the items above this into a Bag and a Wrecking Ball.

Top.name: Top
Top.description:
Use: 2% chance to Lose.
Otherwise, Reveal 1 random item and double the chance to lose.

Trading.name: Roulette
Trading.description: Use: Unequip a random other item, then Equip a random item.

Transmog.name: Test Tube
Transmog.description:
Use: Choose a Revealed item to Morph.
Can be Used once.

Trapdoor.name: Trap
Trapdoor.description:
On Equip: 25% chance to Lose.
After Equipping a nearby item, if this is Revealed, Equips itself.

Trigaze.name: Triangle
Trigaze.description: On Equip: Reveal the corner items.

Turret.name: Turret
Turret.description: After you Equip an item, Break the item this is pointing at, then rotates clockwise.

Twister.name: Twister
Twister.description:
On Equip or Round Start: Reveal the top item.
When you Equip it, Reveal the second row.

Two.name: Sculpture
Two.description: When 2 Revealed items near this are the same, Win.

Tyre.name: Tyre
Tyre.description: If you Win in the first 10 Equips, Reveal 3 random items in the next round.

UFB.name: UFO
UFB.description:
After you Equip an item directly above this, Swaps with it.
When this is at the top, Win.

Underrated.name: Underrated item
Underrated.description: On Equip: Reveal the Hidden item you've Equipped the least.

Underworld.name: Underworld
Underworld.description:
On Equip: Lose.
Then, if you didn't Lose, Win.

Unrevealed.name: Box
Unrevealed.description:
Contains a Hidden item.
Click to Equip it!

Unstable.name: Sun
Unstable.description: When you try to Equip an item, 25% chance to Break and Reveal it instead.

Vampire.name: Vampire
Vampire.description: After you Equip an item, Breaks 2 random other Revealed items. If it can't, Lose.

Violin.name: Violin
Violin.description: After you Equip an item, 10% chance to Lose.

Viral.name: Virus
Viral.description: After you Equip an item, Morph a random item near this into Decay, Equip it, and Swap with it.

Decayed.name: Decay
Decayed.description: On Equip or Morph: If 5 Decays are Equipped, Lose.

Vortex.name: Vortex
Vortex.description: When all items within 2 spaces of this are Equipped, Win.

Waterfall.name: Droplet
Waterfall.description: On Equip: If this is in the bottom row, Win. Otherwise, Morph a random item in the row below into a Droplet.

Wave.name: Wave
Wave.description: On Equip: Equip all items to the right of this.

Whacka.name: Mole
Whacka.description:
On Equip: Morph a random nearby Unequipped item into a Mole.
If this is the third Mole Equipped consecutively, Win.

Wine.name: Wine
Wine.description: If this item is Broken while Equipped, Reveal 5 random items.

WinSeeker.name: Winseeker
WinSeeker.description: Displays the number of nearby items that can make you Win.

Winter.name: Snowman
Winter.description: On Equip: Morph 4 random other items into Snowflakes.

Worldbearer.name: Safe
Worldbearer.description: If this item is Broken while Equipped, Lose.
